CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 13, 1954, pg. 9, reads: "Top Meals - The Centre News, 2167 Centre Avenue, has grown to a full-fledged restaurant. Good, home-cooked meals are their forte, disigned [designed] to please the Sunday after-church crowd.  Their beautifully designed new front, along with a cozy atmosphere, is aimed to please their customers."
TitMainTitle: Three women, possibly waitresses, standing in front of Centre News restaurant, 2167 Centre Avenue, Hill District
